subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Jimmie Johnson moved a step closer to a third consecutive Sprint Cup title by winning the pole at Phoenix International Speedway. Johnson, the defending race winner, turned a lap of 134.725 miles per hour in his Chevrolet to earn the top starting spot Sunday. If he gains 57 more points than Carl Edwards, Johnson will need only to start the season finale to become the first driver since Cale Yarborough (1976-78) to win three titles in a row.
